snippet.title: Game Boy - Garfield Labyrinth © 1993 Activision - Gameplay
snippet.description:
DESCRIPTION
It's the anti-specter squadron everyone loves! Separated from his cohorts in the gloomy passages of a haunted mansion, sharp-witted Ghostbuster Peter Venkman must strut his stuff to survive. Help him fight phantoms, neutralize negative auras and push his ecto-containment skills to their limit!

Haunting music, hidden keys, secret passages and an arsenal of weapons designed for spook demolition make playing The Real Ghostbusters even more fun than watching the hit cartoon that inspired it.

You'll enjoy countless hours of action gameplay and challenging puzzle-solving, with more than 50 increasingly difficult levels.
